entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Garden Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
